jobs.title: Manager, Expert Services Development
accomplishments: Assist clients with custom Episerver software implementations in creating new features, performance recommendations, and best practices.
Started documentation and knowledge sharing framework using git repositories and markdown files.

jobs.title: Product Manager
accomplishments: Streamlined the software development lifecycle through implementing continuous integration and delivery using Git, Visual Studio Team Services, and Octopus Deploy.

Contributor to Elasticsearch open source project Vulcan, for indexing and searching Episerver CMS content and Episerver Commerce products and variants, giving clients a cost-effective search solution.
Built Gulp and MVC view engine for front-end designers to quick-start the design process through lo-fi, hi-fi, and final templates for client projects.
Developed and maintained company website using  Episerver content management system (CMS).

jobs.title: Lead Developer
accomplishments: Lead development of WSOL's latest version of the Super Template (a dynamic Ektron CMS template empowering users in flexible layouts from a single ASP.Net page), utilizing the latest web standards including responsive web design and Ektron CMS PageBuilder.
Architected and developed new features or extensions to the core web product framework.
Led best practice development implementations for clients ensuring successful projects that meet client's needs.
Mentored developers to improve coding, troubleshooting, and communication skills

jobs.title: CMS Architect
accomplishments: Communicated project information through functional specifications, information architecture, and implementation guides to ensure clients' requirements have been captured.
Served as technical lead with development teams throughout website design and implementation.
Provided best practice recommendations to clients in setup and implementation of Ektron CMS 400.NET.

jobs.title: Web Content Architect
accomplishments: Developed a PHP / MySQL self-service web application that allows users to maintain a single password for Active Directory and Open LDAP authentication, create and forward e-mail addresses, and automate key business processes with ERP integration through a custom web service.
Implemented Ektron CMS300 to migrate Morehead State University's website from 30,000+ static HTML files to a database driven website with over 25,000 content items.
Designed strong system architecture to allow for reusable templates built around the latest Web standards such as XHTML, CSS, XML, XSLT, and ASP.NET.
Customized Ektron CMS by creating multiple RSS feeds utilizing XML from list summaries and taxonomies, with XSLT.

Performed training courses and support for faculty, staff, students and campus organizations maintaining content in the Ektron CMS and the Datatel e-Marketing CMS for Active Admissions / Active Alumni.
Served as a technical liaison between the Office of Communications and Marketing and the Office of Information Technology.
